metadata.title: CVE-2019-16714 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 5.2.14, rds6_inc_info_copy in net/rds/recv.callows attackers to obtain sensitive information from kernel stack memorybecause tos and flags fields are not initialized.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
